attributes.action: Review the compensation system for injured service personnel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we believe that the compensation system for injured/disabled service personnel should better reflect the disability and suffering that they have experienced as a result of combat. we would ask that it be brought in line with that of compensation in similar civil cases.

rejection.details:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Injury-awards/

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14710.asp
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
